original_text: knowing that he who raised the Lord Jesus will raise us also with Jesus and bring us with you into his presence.
korean_text: 주 예수를 다시 살리신 이가 예수와 함께 우리도 다시 살리사 너희와 함께 그 앞에 서게 하실 줄을 아노라

sentences.original_text: he who raised the Lord Jesus
will raise us also with Jesus
and bring us with you into his presence.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희와 함께 그의 앞으로 데려가실 것입니다
